description.short: The function mean should take an array of numbers and compute their arithmetic mean. For example, given an array containing 5.0 and 4.0 then mean should return 4.5. Complete the implementation of this function.
description.full: The function mean should take an array of numbers and compute their arithmetic mean. For example, given an array containing 5.0 and 4.0 then mean should return 4.5. Complete the implementation of this function.

Computer science foundations: Programming fundamentals (control and data, typing, recursion)
